reviewText: MARVELOUS MOVIE, HIT SO CLOSE...BROUGHT CLARITY TO MY LIFE'S STRUGGLES!!!!
it was a very true movie per say
Perfect product. Fast, timely delivery as well. I love it, thank you!
Loved the plot, the cast, the music.......all extremely delightful!!!!!
This is a very good family movie. I felt it sent a really strong message to teens, and adults. Loved it
The best Xmas gift ever to an African American or Black individual!
Love this movie!  I had seen it before and wanted to add to my Christmas collection,  I will watch this every year.  I loved the acting, singing and the story line.

Great story line; but I was expecting to hear more from Tyrese Gibson and Mary J. Blige.  For such a strong cast of talented actors and actresses, I felt that a little more character development could have been used to accentuate the father-daughter-ex rift.  Angela Bassett, as always, gave a superior rendition of a subservient wife who had an inner strength of her own.
Okay, strictly  do it by the numbers kind of movie.  Wasn't expecting a lot of singing but it worked.  Something you would watch during the holidays but quickly forget about.
Wonderful, heartwarming story and great musical.  Should become a classic for the holidays.
